attributes.value: Sees life as unfair and doesn't mind it that way
Is disgusted by merrymakers
Considers craftsmanship to be relatively worthless
Values leisure time
Values peace over war
Is quick to anger
Rarely looks on others with lust
Is confident under pressure
Is stubborn
Relies on the advice of others during decision making
Presents herself modestly and frowns on any flashy accoutrements
Is utterly humorless
Generally acts with a narrow focus on the current activity
Is a pessimist
Is generally unhindered by the thoughts of others concerning her actions
Is inattentive to detail in her own work
Does not have feelings of emotional attachment and has never felt even a moment's connection with another being
Never acts without prolonged deliberation, even to her own detriment and the harm of those around her
Actively avoids exciting or stressful situations
Is not readily moved by art or natural beauty
Strong
Extremely agile
Susceptible to disease
A good kinesthetic sense
